search_general_talk_2030_guzma_plumeria/:
Welcome! Care to try a sample of our lovely face
cream, ma’am?
Hmm. Yeah, I guess it couldn’t hurt.

What’s up, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
You want to try it, too?

Or do you have a problem with me looking at
skin care stuff?
How did you like that cream, ma’am?
It was pretty nice, I guess.
Aren’t Stufful cute? They’re like stuffed toys!
You’ve got a thing for Stufful, huh?
Yeah, so what if I do?
Do you like stuffed toys a lot?
They’re fine. I wouldn’t say “a lot.”
Still...Stufful sure are cute.
It’s too bad they don’t like being touched.
Waaahhh!

Geez, you’ve got some lungs on you. What’re you
so upset about?
Waaah! Where’d everyone gooo? Where are they?
Uh-oh. Are you lost?
I can’t find theeem! Where’s the Pokémon Center?

Ah. So you’ll be able to find who you’re looking
for if we get you to the Pokémon Center?

*sigh*
Well, we can’t just leave you here, can we?
Come on—let’s bring you back.
Ah! They’re here!
Thanks for bringing me back here, lady!
Just try not to get lost again, all right?
Tch. Cute, little troublemaker...

Looks like we ended up back at
home base.

*sigh*
It’s fine. We can always try to go for cocoa some
other time.
Still want that cocoa?

*sigh*
I’m good. We’ll try to go again sometime soon.

Oh well. We got a pretty fun walk out of it,
right, [Name:PlayerNickname ]?
Anyway, see you around.
